name: Young Imperial Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 20

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
